values:
Wow I just realized that I never EVER update or personalize this thing... goddamn....

So this is a semi-informative survey...

TEN random things about me: 
10. I'm the shortest one out of all my cousins... and I'm 5'6... 
9. I look and act like the biggest ditz ever but i'm actually studying engineering... go figure. 
8. I'm only 17 and I'm supposed to be a senior in high school... not a freshman in college
7. I played piano for ten years until a fateful day junior year when I just decided to quit
6. I have two cats and a german shepherd
5. I got into the two best schools in my field and I didn't go to either...
4. I love wearing miniskirts
3. I wear contacts 
2. I love skiing
1. I love partying, drinking, clubbing, and anything else that kills time!!!

NINE places i've visited: 
9. Canada
8. China 
7. Miami 
6. East coast
5. Cali
4. AL 
3. A-town 
2. NYC
1. Stl... best place EVER!!!

EIGHT things i want to do before I die: 
8. Go for another party weekend in stl...
7. Go to Miami just for partying with friends....
6. Get closure.... 
5. Find the closest thing to true love
4. Go to a good med school
3. Make it down a green run on a snowboard without falling....
2. Have a summer of fun with friends only in China
1. Own a escalade with 26 inch spinner rims... lol

SEVEN ways to win my heart: 
7. Make me laugh
6. Be a good dancer
5. Be responsible and don't patronize me 
4. Let me have my way 
3. Always support me
2. Smell nice
1. Be tall

SIX things i believe in: 
6. Me 
5. Revenge.... hurt my friends and you will get fucked up!
4. Fate
3. I guess love... but that's kinda iffy
2. hard work
1. FRIENDSHIP (hos before bros)

FIVE things i'm afraid of: 
5. losing someone 
4. Not succeeding
3. Hurting someone unintentionally 
2. Being forgotten 
1. Insects

FOUR of my favorite items in my bedroom: 
4. My boy.... lol altho he's not here right now... 
3. my clothing 
2. My bed 
1. My laptop

THREE things i do everyday: 
3. Laugh!!!
2. Online... aim, facebook, and random 
1. See my boy and chill with friends

TWO things i am trying not to do right now: 
2. Think about my ex
1. Fail college... lol not really but a 3.3 is failing 

ONE person i want to see right now: 
1. Dave... somehow I need to talk to him more than anything...

Hope that helps people understand me a bit better.... lol

Well,
so prom was this past saturday............ muy interesante. So rob and I had a lotta fun........... and of course then me, rob, and anastasia went to bubblebliss got food then went back to my house to watch meet the fockers....... and I fell asleep. So then on monday paul and them were completely harassing me about rob. "you broke him, you need to be gentle with rob, he's fragile".......... all b/c he didn't show up @ school. I get to b ophelia in D's collage b/c she got a pic of me sleeping..... omg 6 more days of school!!!! So friday is senior skip day........ me, anastasia, charles and maybe howard are gonna go to birch run....... and then we got tix to episode 3........ this is gonna b great.

On a side note i've got random bruises.......... leelanau perhaps?

Okay so like the evil claw of colleges/my future/azn rentz has come cracking down. It's like everything is boiling down, everything is being warped. It's so messed up and I wish that things were easier, more calming. Maybe Wash U will do it this year. I don't know it's strange and confusing isn't it? Life is exhausting and I just wish things could calm down for a while.

I did it in 5 seconds.
I deserved an A++!!
Take the How Dexterous Are You? Quiz!! I am proud............... and I beat Kristyn by 2 seconds!!!
hmmmmm seeing as live journal is the new thing i decided to open one up. uhhhhhhhhh nothin much to say...... argh i'll figure something out. But for now sleep!!!!

Sometimes you don't have a choice.
When you can't see another way out you must take the only way out. Not to say that my method was right, but it was my decision. I wish people could just understand that.
